results.1-1: Red, Reflex Surrounded by constant bursts of light. [[/r 20[fire]]] damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} for 1 round, then @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 minute.
results.2-2: Orange, Reflex The ground opens up and swallows you, dissolving you in an ethereal stomach. [[/r 20[acid]]] damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained} (acid).
results.3-3: Yellow, Reflex Thrown around by flying fey and dropped. [[/r 35[bludgeoning]]] damage.
results.4-4: Green, Fortitude Your body feels as if it is melting into the ground. [[/r 25[mental]]] damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.
results.5-5: Blue, Will Intense feelings of melancholy utterly overwhelm you. [[/r 25[mental]]] damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed} for 1 round (emotion)
results.6-6: Indigo, Will The world around you seems to be constantly shifting between planes. Confused for 1 minute but can attempt a new saving throw at the end of each turn to end the confusion (mental)
results.7-7: Violet, Will You get a horrific glimpse of the true nature of the First World, causing you to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fleeing]{Fleeing} for 1 round from the caster. On a critical failure, you first become trapped within a nightmare of the First World, becoming stunned for 1 round, and then frightened 2 and fleeing. (mental)
